topics.body:
well the ghandi thing is funny
let's say all the civ leaders have an aggressiveness level of 1 through 5
ghandi is at 1, he's the most peaceful
well when you hit the industrial age, everyone's number goes down by one
but ghandi's can't go down any farther
so it loops around and he just becomes a dictator

topics.body:
So I sat down to watch some tv with my mom. Usually we watch something we recorded on the DVR or on netflix so we don't have to deal with commercials. 
This was probably about 30 minutes ago
I can't have seen more than 10 minutes of this show. The rest has been commercials. Why is this okay
Why does anyone watch tv any more
How does anyone watch tv any more
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b815963687239d9390900#post_549b815963687239d9390900
True story: during my first deployment I went without TV for a year and a half, and when I got back normal network TV was completely fucking unwatchable for me entirely because of commercials. I'd gotten so used to just watching my shows off of dvds without interruption.
